mindGarden.title: Welcome back to your Mind Garden
mindGarden.subtitle: Every exploration is a testament to growth

moodCheck.title: What color does your mood feel like today?
moodCheck.customPlaceholder: Or describe it in your own words...
moodCheck.skipButton: I don't want to say right now, let's start

wisdom.title: Wise Companion
wisdom.description: Engage in deep conversations with AI

welcome.title: Begin today's growth journey
welcome.description: Let's gently explore your inner thoughts together. Every thought is a precious seed worthy of gentle care.

situation.title: What happened that made you feel this way?
situation.description: You can describe the environment, time, people involved... Of course, feel free to skip if you prefer.
situation.placeholder: Where were you at that moment? What happened? (Optional)
situation.skipButton: Skip for now, go to thoughts

thoughts.title: What thoughts came to mind in that moment?
thoughts.description: This is the most important part. Please honestly record what was going through your mind, whatever it was.
thoughts.placeholder: I was thinking... / I felt... / This made me feel...
thoughts.reminder: You're brave to face your inner voice - this is where growth begins.

emotions.title: How do you feel now compared to earlier?
emotions.description: Please confirm or adjust your emotion choices. Even if you've selected emotions before, you can reassess and adjust here.
emotions.adjustmentHint: You can keep these choices, or readjust them

success.title: Record saved
success.message: Your thoughts have been safely saved in your mind garden

dashboard.title: See the beautiful blooming of your mind garden
dashboard.welcomeMessage: Your growth journey is about to begin, every step is worth recording

emotions.title: Colors of emotion flowers
emotions.empty: No emotion records yet, start planting your feelings

wisdom.title: Wise companion's discoveries
wisdom.empty: Start conversations with your wise companion to discover inner wisdom
